ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He who taught by the pen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who, by the pen, taught the human being:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The One Who taught to write with the pen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who has taught by the pen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who taught (to write) with the pen
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who hath taught mankind by the pen -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He Who taught (the use of) the pen,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who has taught (the writing) by the pen [the first person to write was Prophet Idrees (Enoch)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He who taught by the pen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [96:4] Who taught, [the art of] script, by the pen — the first to write with it was [the prophet] Enoch (Idrīs), peace be upon him —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who teacheth by the pen) Who teaches writing by the pen,
